entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lacombe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:04 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lacombe AAFC 01:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -21.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -24.4°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening with risk of freezing rain. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
